title: Immediate Decision-Making and Language Intervention Training in Stressful Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Verbal Communication Skills and Crisis Awareness Capabilities
context.additional_context: Language-based crisis response training in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment, including simulations reflecting real-world stressors.

learning_goals: Learners execute standard verbal intervention protocols in stressful situations with 80% accuracy after 10 minutes of direct instruction.
Learners collaborate with team members to complete a 5-step crisis management process within 15 minutes in project-based scenarios.
Learners maintain composure and verbal clarity during communication in at least 2 out of 3 simulated crisis assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
